caption_text:
🔥 Sacred Rage Is Rising — Are You Ready?

What if your anger isn’t something to fix...
But something to feel, listen to, and alchemize?

Join us for a free online workshop + community ritual where we explore the sacred power of rage — and how it can become a tool for healing, clarity, and liberation.

🌀 Guided somatic practice
🌿 Herbal wisdom + energetic support
💬 Real conversation — no toxic positivity, no spiritual bypassing
✨ Tools to move energy + increase your emotional capacity

This is for the deep-feelers, the cycle-breakers, the ones ready to stop bottling it up and start transforming it.

📍LIVE on Meet
📆 Wednesday Dec 17 at 7PM
🎁 FREE with RSVP (link in bio)
💌 Space is limited — save your seat now

Tag a friend who needs this and save this post to return to later. 🔥
